title: Large-Scale Computational Thinking-Based Technology Integration Education for Teacher Preparation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental ICT application skills and practical classroom experience
context.additional_context: K-12 educational field application emphasizing competencies that integrate social justice and technology for learners with diverse cultural backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-world educational problems in a structured manner using a computational thinking framework
Learners can develop instructional strategies reflecting diverse learner needs through inclusive class design using digital tools
Learners can apply a social justice approach considering cultural relevance when designing technology-integrated lessons
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
